SELECT uc.competition_id competition_id, uc.user_id user_id, uc.win_ranking win_ranking, uc.win_level_name win_level_name, u.name name,u.user_className user_className, c.competition_name competition_name, tc.college_name college_name FROM t_user_competition uc LEFT JOIN t_user u ON uc.user_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON uc.competition_id = c.competition_id LEFT JOIN t_college tc ON u.college_id = tc.college_id WHERE uc.competition_id = #{v} ORDER BY win_ranking
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_apply(apply_id, apply_time, apply_content, apply_state, team_id, user_id) VALUES (#{applyId}, #{applyTime}, #{applyContent}, #{applyState}, #{team.teamId}, #{user.userId})
mapper.update: UPDATE t_apply SET apply_state = #{applyState}, apply_dispose_time = #{applyDisposeTime} WHERE apply_id = #{applyId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.apply_id apply_id, a.apply_time apply_time, a.apply_state apply_state,a.apply_dispose_time apply_dispose_time, a.apply_content apply_content,t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name FROM t_apply a LEFT JOIN t_team t ON a.team_id = t.team_id LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.apply_state = #{applyState}

SELECT a.apply_id apply_id, a.apply_time apply_time, a.apply_state apply_state,a.apply_dispose_time apply_dispose_time, a.apply_content apply_content,t.team_id team_id, t.team_name team_name, c.competition_id competition_id, c.competition_name competition_name FROM t_apply a LEFT JOIN t_team t ON a.team_id = t.team_id LEFT JOIN t_competition c ON t.competition_id = c.competition_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND a.apply_state != #{applyState}
